title: Emmerdale spoiler: Vinny is not Mandy Dingle's son in twist as identity is exposed
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emmerdale spoilers have revealed that Vinny is hiding his real identity.

Vinny arrived back in the Dale with Lisa Riley 's character Mandy Dingle earlier this year as she returned to see her family.

But a twist in the storyline has revealed that Vinny isn't Mandy's son.

Viewers of the soap were convinced that Vinny was the secret love child of Mandy and Paddy Kirk (Dominic Brunt) who were previously married.

However it looks like Vinny isn't related to the Dingles at all, and is actually covering up his real identity.

Lisa told The Sun Online : "Who is he? Even I'm yet to find that out – it's all still to unfold.

"But Vinny just wants to be part of the family and although the audience finds out that he's not Mandy’s son, the Dingles never do – Mandy makes sure of that.

"Who is his mother? That’s the big question – will it be a cast member, we just don't know."

Could this mean Vinny is secretly related to another cast member?

A source also told the paper that while viewers find out the truth, the rest of the Dingle family will have to wait to find out.

Mandy and Vinny will also be revealed to be running an illegal casino card scam to take money from punters.

(Image: ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

But as Mandy is told to explain herself to the Dingles, she and Vinny make a run for it.

The pair are also facing trouble from casino boss Terry, who they've previously swindled money from.

*Emmerdale airs weekdays on ITV at 7pm with an extra episode on Thursdays at 8pm
description: Emmerdale has revealed that Vinny is hiding his real identity and isn't Mandy's son - but the Dingle family are unaware
